definition: to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
variant of 說|说[shuo1]

sentences.english: Once again park well away from the area.
sentences.chinese: 再说一遍，把车停得远远的。

sentences.english: I felt it useless for us to say anything further.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我们再说下去也没有用。
那就别再说什么死亡了。

sentences.english: What's more, I have got what I need. It is I that should thank you.
sentences.chinese: 再说，我也分得一杯羹，应该谢你才对。

sentences.english: Do we have to pre-book tours, or can we get them on-site?
sentences.chinese: 我们是必须事先预定旅行，还是可以到那儿再说？

sentences.english: What is your name ? I missed it because of QRM. Please say again.
sentences.chinese: 由于干扰严重，没听清楚，请重复再说一遍。

sentences.english: She declined to say more about the plan.
sentences.chinese: 她拒绝对此计划再说些什么。

sentences.english: And who wants it tamed anyway?
sentences.chinese: 再说又有谁想驯服它呢？

sentences.english: Don't speak, you will do a disservice to him.
sentences.chinese: 不要再说了，你只会给他帮倒忙。

sentences.english: H : Well, she said yes agreeably . And travelling in Europe is her dream, too.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，她欣然同意了，再说去欧洲旅行也是她的梦想。

sentences.english: Also, the form of TwHF extract used in the study isn't available for sale.
sentences.chinese: 再说，用于研究的雷公藤提取物还不适合销售。

sentences.english: Speak your love. Speak iy again.
Say the word again, the series of words.
sentences.chinese: 再说一下刚才那一串词。

sentences.english: Timmy Tapper: Oh, sorry. Can I just say one more thing?
sentences.chinese: 哦，不好意思。我能再说几句话吗？

definition: anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
otherwise/or else/or
moreover/besides/in addition/furthermore
(coll.) if
let it be/let it pass/forget about it
it doesn't matter
easy to deal with/not a problem/(polite answer) you flatter me
granted that/even if
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
since/as/this being the case
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
at the minimum/at the very least
in a word/in short/in brief
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
